title: Rename a Branch
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to rename a branch in a Git repository using the command-line interface.

meta.title: Rename a Branch: A Git Versioning Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to efficiently rename a branch in your Git repository and keep your codebase organized.
meta.keywords: rename, version control, git labs, coding, branch, git, git playground
